jobDescription: Recruiting a talented Data Analyst who will engage with PM, Business and Data Owners and develop an effective data inventory through the collection, analysis, cleansing and modeling of data from disparate data sources. Candidates interested in data analysis, trend interpretation, visualization and developing competence around these areas are welcome to apply. Strong data literacy and SQL skills are a must have, at the minimum.DATA ANALYST CHICAGO ILPERMANENT HIRE $80K-$100K BASE COMP + BENEFITSPosition Summary:The Data Analyst will report to the Chief Data Architect and will be responsible for gathering and analyzing data from disparate systems and producing insights to solve business problems. Responsibilities:Create and manage enterprise data models with logical and physical viewsBuild, manage, and maintain a data dictionary and data lineage for various functional areas of business and applicationsCollect, organize, and analyze data using data profiling and data analysis tools such as Talend, Informatica, or by writing custom SQL queriesIngest data from disparate systems using data integration tools or writing custom code in SQL, Python, or other scripting languagesIdentify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets.Work with the functional business area to identify, gather, investigate, and document business processes related to data architectureVisualize data insights using data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or QlikView.Perform root-cause analysis to understand data problems and find solutions by understanding user requirements.Understand use of a data cleansing tool or package such as Talend, or able to write SQL scripts to clean data where necessary.Cleanse data using technical and business validation rules.Build an inventory of data needed to implement the architecturePerform other duties as assigned Required Skills:Strong database querying competency using SQLAbility to develop data visualization dashboards in Tableau, Power BI, or QlikViewExcellent knowledge of using statistical packages for data mining using R, Python, Spark ML, or Azure MLBachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering3 years experience in a data analyst roleAbility to collaborate effectively and work as part of a teamStrong attention to detailUnderstand the fundamental concepts of object oriented programming- provided by Dice Data Analysis, Data Collection, Data Model, Data Dictionary, Data Visualization
